analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyid yin no //
translated: The four bases of supernatural power, the limb of enlightenment consisting of concentration, and right concentration are concentration.

original: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i dran pa ni dran pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i dran pa ni dran pa nyid yin no //

original: ci zhig lus she na /
analyzed: ci zhig lus she na /

translated: The factors of enlightenment are five: correct mindfulness, correct discrimination of phenomena, correct effort, correct joy, correct pliancy, and correct equanimity.🔽The branches of morality are three: correct speech, correct action, and correct livelihood.

original: de ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs de dag ni rdzas bcur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs de dag ni rdzas bcur 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus the factors of enlightenment are ten substances.

original: bye brag tu smra ba dag na re ni lus dang ngag gi las gnyis tha dad pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi yan lag rdzas @236b gnyis yin pas bcu gcig go zhes zer ro //
analyzed: bye brag tu smra ba dag na re ni lus dang ngag gi las gnyis tha dad pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi yan lag rdzas @236b gnyis yin pas bcu gcig go zhes zer ro //
translated: The Vaibhasikas say: There are eleven substances because the two branches of morality are separate substances since they are physical and verbal karma.🔽The foundations of mindfulness and so on are explained to be the nature of wisdom, effort and concentration.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa ni shes rab dang brtson 'grus dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa ni shes rab dang brtson 'grus dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir /
translated: Here,

original: gtso bo smos kyi de dag ni //🔽sbyor byung yon tan thams cad yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: gtso bo smos kyi de dag ni // sbyor byung yon tan thams cad yin par rig par bya ste /
translated: they are said to be the principal🔽because they are the principal factors of enlightenment.

original: gtso bo smos pas de skad bshad pa yin gyi //
analyzed: gtso bo smos pas de skad bshad pa yin gyi //
translated: They are said to be the principal factors of enlightenment because they are the principal factors of enlightenment.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i yon tan thams cad kyang yin no //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i yon tan thams cad kyang yin no //
translated: The foundations of mindfulness, the right efforts, and the bases of supernatural power are all the qualities that arise from practice.

original: gnas skabs gang dag tu byang chub kyi phyogs rnams rab tu skye zhe na /
analyzed: gnas skabs gang dag tu byang chub kyi phyogs rnams rab tu skye zhe na /
translated: In what states are the factors of enlightenment generated?

original: sde tshan bdun ni rim bzhin du //
analyzed: sde tshan bdun ni rim bzhin du //
translated: The seven groups are in order.🔽The first is in the stage of action in faith;

original: las ni dang po bdag dang // nges par 'byed pa'i cha mthun dang // mthong dang bsgom la rab tu skyed //
analyzed: las ni dang po bdag dang // nges par 'byed pa'i cha mthun dang // mthong dang bsgom la rab tu skyed //
translated: the factors of enlightenment are generated in the stages conducive to penetration,🔽in the path of insight, and in the path of cultivation.

original: las dang po pa'i gnas skabs dag la ni phung po la sogs pa la nye bar brtags pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rab tu skyed do //
analyzed: las dang po pa'i gnas skabs dag la ni phung po la sogs pa la nye bar brtags pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rab tu skyed do //
translated: In the stage of the beginner, the foundations of mindfulness are generated in order to investigate the aggregates, etc.

original: khyad par thob pas brtson 'grus yang dag par spel ba'i phyir dro bar gyur pa dag la ni yang dag par spong ba rnams rab tu skyed do //
analyzed: khyad par thob pas brtson 'grus yang dag par spel ba'i phyir dro bar gyur pa dag la ni yang dag par spong ba rnams rab tu skyed do //
translated: In the state of heat, the right efforts are generated in order to increase effort through the attainment of distinction.

original: yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'jug pa'i phyir rtse mo dag na ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rab tu skyed do //🔽yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i sgo nas /
analyzed: yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'jug pa'i phyir rtse mo dag na ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rab tu skyed do // yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i sgo nas /
translated: The summit stages give rise to the bases of psychic power, because they cause one to engage in roots of virtue that do not decline.

original: dbang byed ba thob pa'i phyir bzod pa dag la ni dbang po rnams rab tu skyed do ;🔽/ nyon mongs pas mi brdzi ba'am 'jig rten pa'i chos gzhan gyis mi brtul ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dbang byed ba thob pa'i phyir bzod pa dag la ni dbang po rnams rab tu skyed do ; / nyon mongs pas mi brdzi ba'am 'jig rten pa'i chos gzhan gyis mi brtul ba'i phyir /
translated: The forbearing stages give rise to the faculties, because one obtains control over nondecline.

original: bzod pa dag la ni stobs rnams rab tu skyed do //🔽byang chub dang nye ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bzod pa dag la ni stobs rnams rab tu skyed do // byang chub dang nye ba'i phyir /
translated: The forbearing stages give rise to the powers, because one is not crushed by afflictions or by other mundane phenomena.

original: bsgom pa'i lam la ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rab tu skyed do //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam la ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rab tu skyed do //
translated: The proximate stages give rise to the limbs of enlightenment, because enlightenment is near.

original: 'gro bas rab tu phye ba'i phyir mthong ba'i lam la ni lam gyi yan lag rnams rab tu skyed de /
analyzed: 'gro bas rab tu phye ba'i phyir mthong ba'i lam la ni lam gyi yan lag rnams rab tu skyed de /
translated: The path of seeing gives rise to the limbs of the path, because it is distinguished by going,

original: de ni myur bar 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni myur bar 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it goes quickly.

original: grangs dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir sngar bdun bshad la phyis brgyad bshad par go rims grub bo //
analyzed: grangs dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir sngar bdun bshad la phyis brgyad bshad par go rims grub bo //
translated: The order is established by the fact that seven are mentioned first and eight later, in order to correspond to the number.

original: da ni byang chub kyi phyogs du zhig ni zag pa dang bcas pa yin /
analyzed: da ni byang chub kyi phyogs du zhig ni zag pa dang bcas pa yin /
translated: How many of the factors of enlightenment are impure?

original: du zhig ni zag pa med pa yin zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: du zhig ni zag pa med pa yin zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ste /
translated: How many are pure?

original: byang chub yan lag lam yan lag / zag pa med /
analyzed: byang chub yan lag lam yan lag / zag pa med /
translated: The factors of enlightenment and the path factors are pure.

original: de gnyis ni bsgom pa dang mthong ba'i lam la rnam par gzhag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis ni bsgom pa dang mthong ba'i lam la rnam par gzhag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are established in the path of meditation and the path of seeing.

original: 'jig rten pa la yang yang dag pa'i lta ba yod mod kyi de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam zhes bya ba'i ming mi 'thob bo //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa la yang yang dag pa'i lta ba yod mod kyi de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam zhes bya ba'i ming mi 'thob bo //
translated: Although there is right view in the mundane sphere, it does not obtain the name noble path.

original: @237a * // gzhan rnam gnyis so //
analyzed: @237a * // gzhan rnam gnyis so //
translated: The others are of two kinds.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs gzhan dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa yang yin zag pa med pa yang yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs gzhan dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa yang yin zag pa med pa yang yin no //
translated: The other factors of enlightenment are either impure or pure.

original: sa gang dag cig na byang chub kyi phyogs du dag cig yod ce na /
analyzed: sa gang dag cig na byang chub kyi phyogs du dag cig yod ce na /
translated: In which stages are the factors of enlightenment?

original: thams cad bsam gtan dang po na //
analyzed: thams cad bsam gtan dang po na //
translated: All are in the first absorption.

original: bsam gtan dang po na ni sum cu rtsa bdun thams cad yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po na ni sum cu rtsa bdun thams cad yod do //
translated: In the first meditation, there are thirty-seven members.

original: mi lcogs med na dga'am gtogs //
analyzed: mi lcogs med na dga'am gtogs //
translated: In the preparatory meditation, there is joy and the members of the third meditation.

original: ci'i phyir mi lcogs ba med pa na dga' ba med ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi lcogs ba med pa na dga' ba med ce na /
translated: Why is there no joy in the preparatory meditation?

original: nyer bsdogs rnams ni 'jug pa stobs kyis drang dgos pa dang / sa 'og ma pa'i dgos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyer bsdogs rnams ni 'jug pa stobs kyis drang dgos pa dang / sa 'og ma pa'i dgos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the preparatory meditation is entered by force, and because it is associated with the disadvantage of the stage below.

original: yang dag rtog ma gtogs gnyis pa //
analyzed: yang dag rtog ma gtogs gnyis pa //
translated: In the second meditation, there is no correct thought.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa drug kho na ste /🔽de na rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa drug kho na ste / de na rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the second meditation, there are thirty-six members, excluding correct thought.

original: gnyis na de gnyis ma gtogs pa //
analyzed: gnyis na de gnyis ma gtogs pa //
translated: Because there is no vitarka in the second meditation.

original: bsam gtan gsum dang bzhi pa dag na ni dga' ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa gnyis ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa lnga kho na'o //🔽bsam gtan bar ma na'ang /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum dang bzhi pa dag na ni dga' ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa gnyis ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa lnga kho na'o // bsam gtan bar ma na'ang /
translated: In the third and fourth meditations, there are thirty-five members, excluding joy and correct thought.

original: de gnyis nyid ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'o //
analyzed: de gnyis nyid ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'o //
translated: In the intermediate meditation, there are also thirty-five members, excluding these same two members.

original: gzugs med pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa /
translated: In the formless perception-spheres, there are thirty-one members.

original: gsum na de dang mtshungs yan lag / ma gtogs pa zhes bya bar sbyar te //
analyzed: gsum na de dang mtshungs yan lag / ma gtogs pa zhes bya bar sbyar te //
translated: In the third, the same, except for the members.

original: gzugs med pa dag na ni /
analyzed: gzugs med pa dag na ni /
translated: In the formless realms,

original: yang dag pa'i dag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba dang / dga' ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa gnyis ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i dag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba dang / dga' ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa gnyis ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: there are thirty-two members, by excluding the right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right concentration.🔽In the realm of desire and in the summit of cyclic existence,

original: byang chub yan lag lam yan lag / ma gtogs 'dod khams srid rtse na //
analyzed: byang chub yan lag lam yan lag / ma gtogs 'dod khams srid rtse na //
translated: the members of enlightenment and the members of the path are excluded.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs nyi shu rtsa gnyis te //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs nyi shu rtsa gnyis te //
translated: The members of enlightenment are twenty-two in number.

original: de gnyis na zag pa med pa'i lam med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis na zag pa med pa'i lam med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In these two realms, the pure path does not exist.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams la gnas pa na /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams la gnas pa na /
translated: When one is in the members of enlightenment,

original: gnas skabs gang dag tu shes nas dad pa thob par rig par bya zhe na /
analyzed: gnas skabs gang dag tu shes nas dad pa thob par rig par bya zhe na /
translated: in what states does one obtain the faith of understanding?🔽One obtains the faith of understanding by seeing the three truths, by the morality of the ascetic, and by contentment.

original: bden pa gsum mthong tshul khrims dang // chog la shes nas dad pa 'thob //🔽lam mngon rtogs na sangs rgyas dang // de yi dge 'dun dag la yang //
analyzed: bden pa gsum mthong tshul khrims dang // chog la shes nas dad pa 'thob //🔽lam mngon rtogs na sangs rgyas dang // de yi dge 'dun dag la yang //
